name: Dell - Configure DCU
description: Run Dell Command Update - Limit the Updates to the boxes below. If you uncheck all boxes, then it will update everything it finds. Example, to limit updates to drivers, check the drivers box.

versions.description:
Configures 

Example, to limit updates to drivers, check the drivers box.

options.name: updateTypeApplications
options.description: Include Applications to be installed or updated

options.name: updateTypeDrivers
options.description: Include Drivers to be installed or updated

options.name: updateTypeBIOSFirmware
options.description: Include BIOS & Firmware to be installed or updated

options.name: scanonly
options.description: This will not apply the updates, but scan and log results for you to consider

options.name: updateSeverityRating
options.description: Limit the Update to the Severity rating
